trend_summary: Across the sequence the compact radial-grid fabric remains intact, indicating a mature, high-density city core. Change is incremental: scattered vacant plots are infilled, roofs are refurbished—some gaining solar arrays—and vegetation steadily increases along streets, plazas and courtyards. No major network expansion occurs; upgrades focus on greening and building renewal.
notable_changes: Several small empty lots converted into new mid-rise buildings, completing perimeter blocks.
Gradual increase of tree canopy along boulevards and within the two roundabouts.
Multiple flat roofs brightened or fitted with solar panels, improving reflectance.
Street resurfacing and lane re-marking visible on the main diagonal avenue.
Minor plaza landscaping upgrades around the central circular intersection.
